summary: A survey of adversarial attacks and defenses for LLM
title: Adversarial attacks and defenses for large language models (LLMs): methods, frameworks & challenges

content:
论文链接
Siamese Network（孪生网络）是一种特殊的DNN架构，旨在学习两个输入之间的相似度。它被广泛应用于诸如人脸识别、文档匹配、图像相似性检测等任务。
本文使用孪生网络进行数据清洗和预测结果的判断。

title: Verify your Labels! Trustworthy Predictions and Datasets via Confidence Scores
